resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Listening Strategies:Violent Movies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörende Strategies:Violent Filme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Films D'Écoute de Strategies:Violent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Filmes Escutando De Strategies:Violent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Film Ascoltanti Di Strategies:Violent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κινηματογράφοι Strategies:Violent ακούσματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Películas De Strategies:Violent Que escuchan</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a worksheet where English students improve their vocabulary related to veiwing violent movies ,words which they may also encounter in listening comprehension exercises. Includes some translation to hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">violence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Bogen, in dem englische 
Kursteilnehmer ihren Wortschatz verbessern, der auf dem Veiwing 
heftige Filme in Verbindung gestanden wird, Wörter, die sie in 
hörendem Erfassen auch antreffen können trainieren. Schließt 
irgendeine Übersetzung zum Hebräer ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau où les étudiants anglais 
améliorent leur vocabulaire lié à veiwing des films violents, les 
mots qu'ils peuvent également rencontrer dans la compréhension 
d'écoute s'exerce. Inclut une certaine traduction à l'hébreu</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha onde os estudantes ingleses 
melhorem seu vocabulário relacionado a veiwing filmes violentos, as 
palavras que podem também encontrar na compreensão escutando 
exercitam. Inclui alguma tradução ao hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro in cui gli allievi 
inglesi migliorano il loro vocabolario relativo a veiwing i 
film violenti, parole che possono anche incontrare nella 
comprensione ascoltante si esercitano. Include una certa 
traduzione ad ebreo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας όπου οι αγγλικοί 
σπουδαστές βελτιώνουν το λεξιλόγιό τους σχετικό με οι βίαιοι 
κινηματογράφοι, λέξεις που μπορούν επίσης να αντιμετωπίσουν στις 
ασκήσεις κατανόησης ακούσματος. Περιλαμβάνει κάποια 
μετάφραση στα εβραϊκά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja de trabajo donde los estudiantes
ingleses mejoran su vocabulario relacionado con veiwing películas 
violentas, las palabras que pueden también encontrar en la 
comprensión que escucha ejercitan. Incluye una cierta 
traducción al hebreo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewalttätigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Filme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
